title: Bloomberg Markets: What Trump Should Know About North Korea
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: What Trump Should Know About North Korea
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jamie F Metzl Senior Fellow Atlantic Council Discussing 12 things President Trump should know about North Korea, as Trump continues his campaign of pressure warning if the regime “does anything” to the U.S. or a U.S. ally “things will happen to them like they never thought possible.”

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
